title: build: dev.cc build broken on plan 9 due to statements the compiler cannot handle
body:
by **mischief@offblast.org**: 
i'm building c6787f2301d2+ (dev.cc) tip on plan9/386. the host compiler (9front's 8c)
fails to build 8g, due to the diagnostic 'out of fixed registers'. by decomposing the
problematic code in 8g to use a temporary stack variable, the problem is fixed. if the
patch attached is ok i will make a cl.
Attachments: 1. 8g.diff (865 bytes)
